name: Is it Love? Stories - Otome
description: 1492 Studio is a video game studio based in France. It was co-founded in 2014 by Claire and Thibaud Zamora, two entrepreneurs with over 20 years’ experience in the freemium game industry. Acquired by Ubisoft in 2018, the studio continues to create interactive stories in the form of visual novels and to continually enrich the content of the “Is It Love?” series. With 14 mobile applications and more than 60 million downloads to date, 1492 Studio takes gamers on a journey through storylines full of suspense, intrigue and romance. Today, the studio continues to operate its live games by creating additional content and communicating with a growing and passionate fan base, while still focusing on developing new projects.
